ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67664?3" EMS Response (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Response"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSDelayRelationship
This eMSDelayRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSDispatchDelayRelationship
This eMSDispatchDelayRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67480?4" Dispatch delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet DispatchDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.50 STATIC
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSResponseDelayRelationship
This eMSResponseDelayRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67557?9" Response delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResponseDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.51 STATIC
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSSceneDelayRelationship
This eMSSceneDelayRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67558?7" Scene delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet SceneDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.52 STATIC
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSTransportDelayRelationship
This eMSTransportDelayRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67559?5" Transport delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.53 STATIC
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSTurnaoundDelayRelationship
This eMSTurnaoundDelayRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67560?3" Turnaround delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TurnAroundDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.54 STATIC
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSDispatchLocationRelationship

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSResponseOdometerReadingsRelationship
This eMSResponseOdometerReadingsRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] organizer
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSResponseBeginningOdometerReadingRelationship
This eMSResponseBeginningOdometerReadingRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67484?6" EMS Response odometer beginning reading (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSResponseOnSceneOdometerReadingRelationship
This eMSResponseOnSceneOdometerReadingRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67485?3" EMS Response odometer on-scene reading (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSResponseDestinationOdometerReadingRelationship
This eMSResponseDestinationOdometerReadingRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67486?1" EMS Response odometer destination reading (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSResponseModeToSceneRelationship
This eMSResponseModeToSceneRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67482?0" Response mode to scene (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportationMode 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.66 STATIC
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
